title: Milestone - all champs unlocked
body:
As the title says - got all champs unlocked now. 2 from hextech (including the satan himself {{champion:17}}  which I will carry like a taint on my account until I stop playing), and the rest from IP.

Took a while but I got there!

Now, what to do with surplus IP?

replies.body:
icons, runes and new champions.

You'll now join the club of thousands of LoL players who have over 200K IP and nothing to do but change your summoner name every few months
